attributes.action: Urge the BBC, who are funded by the viewers (mostly), to keep Neighbours on BBC tv
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As it's the licence payers and the general public , who fund the BBC, surely we must have influence on what we see on TV. After all, the beeb is a British Institution and  has already lost major sprting events like F1 and cricket to commercial stations.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
